alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 10:22AM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except 4 to 10 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will create dangerous blowing snow which will make it difficult or impossible to keep roads passable. * WHERE...Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible and visibility will be greatly reduced.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
